column2: The United States of Murder Inc. (2014) #4
column6: This new crime epic saga from the award-winning creators of POWERS continues! Valentine and Jagger are on the run as the five families meet to decide the fate of the United States of Murder Inc. Every issue delivers powerful visuals by Eisner Award winner Michael Avon Oeming and a story by the writer of some of your favorite Marvel comics including ALL-NEW X-MEN!
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | penciller (cover):Mike Avon Oeming
